name: Snowy snowbrawler
description:
This is a short game where you can play with your friends and shoot each others to win. The goal is to be the last player standing on the ground.

To do so, one player needs to create a game while the others need to join thanks to the lobby code.

Then, use your mouse to aim and left click to throw a powerful snowball. Shooting will make you move towards the opposite direction of the thrown snowball.
Any player hit by a snowball will get a significant knockback. Pay attention to not fall over the edge !

Created by : Romain Tanguy Tom Saury Antonin Lesoudier Guillaume Jacot Mathieu Caspar

for a one-week-long school game jam
